questions.text: Who stars as the muse Kira in the 1980 musical film Xanadu?
questions.explanation: Olivia Newton-John played Kira, a muse who comes down to Earth to inspire an artist.

questions.text: Which legendary Hollywood actor played Danny McGuire in his final film role?
questions.explanation: Gene Kelly played Danny McGuire, a former musician who helps build the roller disco.

questions.text: Which band collaborated with Olivia Newton-John on the film's soundtrack?
questions.explanation: Jeff Lynne's ELO wrote and performed half of the soundtrack, including the title track.

questions.text: The club 'Xanadu' opens as what type of venue?
questions.explanation: Xanadu becomes a glitzy roller disco, capitalizing on the roller skating craze of the era.

questions.text: What is the name of the artist/protagonist Kira falls in love with?
questions.explanation: Sonny Malone, played by Michael Beck, is the struggling artist who falls for Kira.

questions.text: Which song from the soundtrack became a #1 hit worldwide?
questions.explanation: 'Magic', performed by Olivia Newton-John, was a massive chart-topper.

questions.text: In the film, Kira is actually one of the nine muses from which mythology?
questions.explanation: She is Terpsichore, the Greek muse of dance.

questions.text: The movie Xanadu is loosely a remake of which 1947 film?
questions.explanation: It is a loose remake of 'Down to Earth', which itself was a sequel to 'Here Comes Mr. Jordan'.

questions.text: What does Kira usually wear while moving around?
questions.explanation: Kira is famously seen skating throughout much of the movie.

questions.text: Which animated sequence appears in the film?
questions.explanation: The song 'Don't Walk Away' features an animated sequence by Don Bluth.

questions.text: Despite being a box office flop, what 'award' was created specifically to honor Xanadu's badness?
questions.explanation: John Wilson created the Golden Raspberry Awards (Razzies) after seeing a double feature of Xanadu and Can't Stop the Music.

questions.text: The song 'Suddenly' is a duet between Olivia Newton-John and whom?
questions.explanation: It features Cliff Richard on vocals with Olivia.

questions.text: What happens to Kira at the end of the film?

options.A: She stays on Earth as a human
options.C: She becomes a roller derby queen
options.D: She is allowed to return for a 'moment' (lifetime)

questions.explanation: Zeus allows her to return to Earth to be with Sonny for a moment, which translates to a human lifetime.

questions.text: In 2007, Xanadu was adapted into what?
questions.explanation: It became a surprise hit Broadway musical that poked fun at the original film's plot holes.
